# Terminus Persistence - Private Package Distribution

This directory contains the **private full-features version** of Terminus Persistence.

## Files

- **TerminusPersistence-private.sublime-package**: The complete plugin package with all menu features
- **INSTALL.md**: Detailed installation instructions for all platforms
- **install.sh**: Automated installer for Linux/macOS
- **README.md**: This file

## Quick Installation

### Linux/macOS (Automated)
```bash
cd dist/
./install.sh
```

### Manual Installation (All Platforms)
See [INSTALL.md](INSTALL.md) for detailed instructions.

## What's Different?

This private version includes:
- ✓ **Toggle Panel** menu item (not in public version)
- ✓ **Toggle Persistence** menu item (same as public)

The public version (available via Package Control) only includes the "Toggle Persistence" menu item to comply with Package Control guidelines.

## Version Information

- **Branch**: private-full-features
- **Package Type**: Full-featured private distribution
- **Recommended for**: Personal use, manual installation

## Support

For issues or questions:
- Check [INSTALL.md](INSTALL.md) for troubleshooting
- Visit: https://github.com/gabriel-lody/terminus-persistence
